description: The Eisenhower Matrix is a productivity, prioritization, and time-management framework designed to help you prioritize a list of tasks or agenda items by first categorizing those items according to their urgency and importance.
content:
Eisenhower Matrix

Urgent & Important

    % for my $elem ( @{$urgent_important} ) {
  • <%= $elem %> % }

Not Urgent, Important

    % for my $elem ( @{$not_urgent_important} ) {
  • <%= $elem %> % }

Urgent, Not Important

    % for my $elem ( @{$urgent_not_important} ) {
  • <%= $elem %> % }

Not Urgent & Not Important

    % for my $elem ( @{$not_urgent_not_important} ) {
  • <%= $elem %> % }

vars.description: What things do you have to do that are both urgent and important?
vars.name: urgent_important
vars.title: Urgent & Important

vars.name: not_urgent_important
vars.title: Not Urgent, but it is Important
vars.description: What things do you have to do that are not urgent but are important?
What things do you have to do that are urgent but not important?
vars.name: urgent_not_important
vars.title: Urgent, but not Important

vars.name: not_urgent_not_important
vars.title: Neither Urgent, Nor Important
vars.description: What things do you have to do that are neither urgent nor important?

name: Eisenhower Matrix
